input.sentences: the college students were celebrating the end of semester .
the went to a restaurant for dinner .
everyone was a little goofy after all the tests .
it was so nice to relax .
the group was quite big and had a great time .
output.sentences: Sometimes when you are a student, you have to go out and have fun.
Enjoying drinks with your friends is about the best thing you can do.
You gotta live life to the fullest with your pals.
And learn to let loose when things are stressful.
It doesn't hurt to have a pretty girl next to you.
